ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [RE: [eqbards] Need assistance please  ]    ]
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t *ASK* if you can leave the chessboard.  Program a social to the referee so you send him/her a tell and they know you aren t leaving the zone.  I say a
ygData.messageBody:
Don't *ASK* if you can leave the chessboard. Program
a social to the referee so you send him/her a tell and
they know you aren't leaving the zone. I say a button
because you may be busy as you run...

It is easier to ask forgiveness than to get
permission ... especially when playing a widely
misunderstood class;-)

Oh yeah...this magican starts the duel WITHOUT the pet
and summon after the fight begins...pretty much the
convention but your opponent may try to argue
otherwise. Pets are somewhat variable in level and
you don't want him showing up with something that cons
yellow to him.

best of luck...

--- Lisa <Lilyanatwin@...> wrote:
> I'm getting some great ideas guys! Thanks so much!
> Yep Tyunes, that's the
> idea...losing is something I sort of expect with him
> being the level he is,
> but I want to at least put a hurtin' on him! I will
> have to check to make sure
> I can leave the board, that would be soooo funny!
> Everyone would be like where
> did she go? And I do have a friend I can borrow
> claws from :-)
>
> Melodii
>
> Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:
>
> > Heh, I can see it now: "The bard is cheating!"
> Just
> > remember, running like the gingerbread man is what
> we
> > do best;-)
> >
> > There is a goblin Camp North of the chessboard. A
> > 15th lvl pet will kill them in no time but they
> should
> > keep the pet occupied long enough for you to go
> back
> > and melee the mage a bit.
> >
> > ...and borrow a thulian claw or something really
> fast
> > from the genius who matched you up with a con-red
> > opponent.
> >
> > I'd also work overtime to make 12th lvl, which you
> can
> > easily do at the chessboard, but a quick place is
> the
> > Derv Camp in West Commons...you might even make 13
> by
> > then. You are still at a disadvantage but at
> least
> > you would have bellow as an extra tool.
> >
> > > And if the
> > > pet roots you...
> >
> > If the pet roots you and you are singing Selo's
> you
> > can usually break root the next round...
> >
> > good luck...even if you don't win, make sure your
> > opponent knows he was in a fight!
> >
> > Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> >
